product_name: CygoLite MityCross 800 OSP Front Bike Light
long_description: Weighing a scant 240g, the CygoLite MityCross 800 front bike light features dual-beam brightness in a single-beam size for all your low-light riding needs. Light has 3 constant lighting modes: high (800 lumens), medium (500 lumens), low (100 lumens), and 3 special lighting modes: 2-in-1 SteadyPulse(TM), day flash and walking. SteadyPulse illumination mode combines steady brightness with an alerting flash, letting you see what's ahead of you while simultaneously letting others know your presence. OSP (On-Site Programmable) technology lets you set brightness levels and customize light flash speeds to suit your needs, all with the push of the button while riding. Compact aluminum light casing is lightweight and weathers the roughest conditions; an easy-to-reach control button is visible at all times. Illuminated display indicates which light setting is in use; battery indicator displays level of remaining power. Slim, rechargeable lithium ion battery lasts 2 hrs. on the highest setting and up to 30 hrs. on day flash; battery is small enough to be mounted on stem or frame. Quick-release mount on the CygoLite MityCross 800 OSP light fits 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars.
short_description: Weighing a scant 240g, the CygoLite MityCross 800 front bike light features dual-beam brightness in a single-beam size for all your low-light riding needs.
